title: THE SPACE BROTHERS-SHINE WITH OAKENFOLD REMIX BONUS DISC SASHABL
description:
THE SPACE BROTHERS-SHINE WITH OAKENFOLD REMIX BONUS DISC SASHABLUE{SECTION8}SHAREGO
The Space Brothers are famous for a string of hit singles that started with club classics &#039;SHINE&#039; and &#039;FORGIVEN&#039;. Paul Oakenfold originally wanted to sign their debut single to Perfecto. They eventually worked together when Paul agreed to mix the bonus cd on their album.

Aside from their recording work, The Space Brothers have been actively involved in various other projects that include remixes and collaborations - a notable top ten hit was the Matt Darey track "BEAUTIFUL". They have also written music for the television series "The Sopranos", as well as tracks for films including "Manumission The Movie" and the John Travolta film - "Swordfish". Recently added to the audiojelly site is &#039;The Best of The Space Brothers&#039; which can be found in the albums section.


www.thespacebrothers.com
